verses.verse: And Dinah<WH1783> the daughter<WH1323> of Leah<WH3812>, which she gave birth to<WH3205> unto Jacob<WH3290>, went out<WH3318> to see<WH7200> the daughters<WH1323> of the land<WH776>.

And when Shechem<WH7927> the son<WH1121> of Hamor<WH2544> the Hivite<WH2340>, prince<WH5387> of the country<WH776>, saw<WH7200> her<WH3947>, he took her<WH7901>, and lay with her<WH6031>, and defiled her.
And his soul<WH5315> joined<WH1692> unto Dinah<WH1783> the daughter<WH1323> of Jacob<WH3290>, and he loved<WH157> the damsel<WH5291>, and spoke<WH1696> kindly<WH3820> unto the damsel<WH5291>.
And Shechem<WH7927> spoke<WH559> unto his father<WH1> Hamor<WH2544>, saying<WH559>, Get<WH3947> me this girl<WH3207> to wife<WH802>.

And Jacob<WH3290> heard<WH8085> that he had defiled<WH2930> Dinah<WH1783> his daughter<WH1323>: now his sons<WH1121> were with his cattle<WH4735> in the field<WH7704>: and Jacob<WH3290> held his peace<WH2790> until they were come<WH935>.
And Hamor<WH2544> the father<WH1> of Shechem<WH7927> went out<WH3318> unto Jacob<WH3290> to speak<WH1696> with him<WH854>.

And the sons<WH1121> of Jacob<WH3290> came<WH935> out of the field<WH7704> when they heard<WH8085> it<WH582>: and the men were grieved<WH6087>, and they were very<WH3966> angry<WH2734>, because he had done<WH6213> wickedness<WH5039> in Israel<WH3478> in lying<WH7901> with Jacob<WH3290>'s daughter<WH1323>; which thing ought not to be done<WH6213>.
And Hamor<WH2544> spoke<WH1696> with them<WH559>, saying, The soul<WH5315> of my son<WH1121> Shechem<WH7927> longs<WH2836> for your daughter<WH1323>: I pray you give<WH5414> her him to wife<WH802>.
And make you marriages<WH2859> with us<WH5414>, and give your daughters<WH1323> unto us<WH3947>, and take our daughters unto you<WH1323>.
And you shall live<WH3427> with us<WH776>: and the land shall be<WH1961> before you<WH6440>; live<WH3427> and trade<WH5503> you in it and get you possessions in it<WH270>
And Shechem<WH7927> said<WH559> unto her father<WH1> and unto her brothers<WH251>, Let me find<WH4672> grace<WH2580> in your eyes<WH5869>, and what you shall say<WH559> unto me I will give<WH5414>.
Ask<WH7235> me ever so much<WH3966> dowry<WH4119> and gift<WH4976>, and I will give<WH5414> according as you shall say<WH559> unto me<WH5414>: but give me the damsel<WH5291> to wife<WH802>.

And the sons<WH1121> of Jacob<WH3290> answered<WH6030> Shechem<WH7927> and Hamor<WH2544> his father<WH1> deceitfully<WH4820>, and said<WH1696>, because he had defiled<WH2930> Dinah<WH1783> their sister<WH269>:

And they said<WH559> unto them<WH3808>, We cannot do<WH6213> this thing<WH1697>, to give<WH5414> our sister<WH269> to one<WH376> that is uncircumcised<WH6190>; for that were a reproach unto us<WH2781>:
But in this<WH2063> will we consent<WH225> unto you<WH2145>: If you will be as we be, that every male of you be circumcised<WH4135>;
Then will we give<WH5414> our daughters<WH1323> unto you<WH3947>, and we will take your daughters<WH1323> to us<WH3427>, and we will live with you<WH259>, and we will become one people<WH5971>.
But if you will not listen<WH8085> unto us<WH4135>, to be circumcised; then will we take<WH3947> our daughter<WH1323>, and we will be gone<WH1980>.
And their words<WH1697> pleased<WH3190> Hamor<WH2544>, and Shechem<WH7927> Hamor<WH2544>'s son<WH1121>.

And the young man<WH5288> waited<WH309> not to do<WH6213> the thing<WH1697>, because he had delight<WH2654> in Jacob<WH3290>'s daughter<WH1323>: and he was more honourable<WH3513> than all the house<WH1004> of his father<WH1>.
And Hamor<WH2544> and Shechem<WH7927> his son<WH1121> came<WH935> unto the gate<WH8179> of their city<WH5892>, and spoke<WH1696> with the men<WH582> of their city<WH5892>, saying<WH559>,

These men<WH582> are peaceful<WH8003> with<WH854> us<WH3427>; therefore let them live in the land<WH776>, and trade<WH5503> in it for the land<WH776>, behold<WH7342>, it is large enough<WH3027> for them<WH6440>; let us take<WH3947> their daughters<WH1323> to us for wives<WH802>, and let us give<WH5414> them our daughters<WH1323>.

Only if<WH2063> will the men<WH582> consent<WH225> unto us for to live<WH3427> with us<WH259>, to be one people<WH5971>, if every male<WH2145> among us be circumcised<WH4135>, as they are circumcised<WH4135>.
Shall not their cattle<WH4735> and their substance<WH7075> and every animal<WH929> of theirs be ours<WH225>? only let us consent unto them<WH3427>, and they will live with us.

And unto Hamor<WH2544> and unto Shechem<WH7927> his son<WH1121> listened<WH8085> all that went out<WH3318> of the gate<WH8179> of his city<WH5892>; and every male<WH2145> was circumcised<WH4135>, all that went out<WH3318> of the gate<WH8179> of his city<WH5892>.

And it came to pass on the third<WH7992> day<WH3117>, when they were sore<WH3510>, that two<WH8147> of the sons<WH1121> of Jacob<WH3290>, Simeon<WH8095> and Levi<WH3878>, Dinah<WH1783>'s brothers<WH251>, took<WH3947> each man<WH376> his sword<WH2719>, and came<WH935> upon the city<WH5892> boldly<WH983>, and killed<WH2026> all the males<WH2145>.

And they killed<WH2026> Hamor<WH2544> and Shechem<WH7927> his son<WH1121> with the edge<WH6310> of the sword<WH2719>, and took<WH3947> Dinah<WH1783> out<WH3947> of Shechem<WH7927>'s house<WH1004>, and went out<WH3318>.
The sons<WH1121> of Jacob<WH3290> came<WH935> upon the dead<WH2491>, and spoiled<WH962> the city<WH5892>, because they had defiled<WH2930> their sister<WH269>.
They took<WH3947> their sheep<WH6629>, and their oxen<WH1241>, and their donkeys<WH2543>, and that which was in the city<WH5892>, and that which was in the field<WH7704>,
And all their wealth<WH2428>, and all their little ones<WH2945>, and their wives<WH802> took they captive<WH7617>, and spoiled<WH962> even all that was in the house<WH1004>.

And Jacob<WH3290> said<WH559> to Simeon<WH8095> and Levi<WH3878>, you have troubled<WH5916> me to make me to stink<WH887> among the inhabitants<WH3427> of the land<WH776>, among the Canaanites<WH3669> and the Perizzites<WH6522>: and I being few<WH4962> in number<WH4557>, they shall gather themselves together<WH622> against me<WH5221>, and slay me; and I shall be destroyed<WH8045>, I and my house<WH1004>.
And they said<WH559>, Should he deal<WH6213> with our sister<WH269> as with a prostitute<WH2181>?
